title: Narrative-Based Hypertext Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen pre-service/in-service teachers' capacity to design and evaluate hypertext-based mathematics education materials

learning_goals: Learners can design hypertext mathematics content utilizing narrative structures.
Learners develop interactive learning materials based on problem-solving scenarios.
Learners conceptualize hypertext navigation systems that consider learner motivation and contextual understanding.
Learners can provide feedback on peers' hypertext designs using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
